original_title: God's Cartoonist: The Comic Crusade of Jack Chick
overview: A documentary about the world's most published and controversial comic artist: Jack T. Chick. His cartoons, conspiracies, and controversies are revealed for the first time on screen. Both critics and supporters give a complete view of this mysterious recluse, the invisible mastermind behind the Chick comic book Empire.
tagline: Can a comic book save your soul?
title: God's Cartoonist: The Comic Crusade of Jack Chick
